大人買い: (おとながい) - buying a large amount (esp. of collectible items aimed at kids, such as manga)
大仏: (だいぶつ) - large statue of Buddha (trad. at least 4.8m high)
大仕事: (おおしごと) - big job; great task
大代表: (だいだいひょう) - main (switchboard) number; main telephone (phone) number
大任: (たいにん) - important task; heavy responsibility
大企業: (だいきぎょう) - large company; enterprise
大会: (たいかい) - convention; tournament; mass meeting; rally
大会社: (だいがいしゃ) - large industrial company; major corporation; big business
大伽藍: (だいがらん) - large temple edifice; large temple
大佐賀: (オオサガ) - Sebastes iracundus (species of rockfish)
大体: (だいたい) - outline/main point/gist; general/substantially/approximately/about; in the first place/to begin with/from the start
大作家: (だいさっか) - great writer; major writer
大使級会談: (たいしきゅうかいだん) - ambassador-level conference
大使館付き武官: (たいしかんづきぶかん) - military officer attached to embassy
大便所: (だいべんじょ) - toilet for feces
大保: (たいほ) - Grand Protector (lowest of the top three civil positions of the Zhou Dynasty); Minister of the Right (official in Nara and Heian periods)
大修道院長: (だいしゅうどういんちょう) - abbot; archimandrite
大倭: (おおやまと) - Japan; (おおやまと only)  Yamato/ancient province corresponding to modern-day Nara Prefecture
大儀ながら: (たいぎながら) - sorry to trouble you, but ...
大儒: (たいじゅ) - great Confucian (scholar); great scholar/person of great erudition
大儲け: (おおもうけ) - large profit; a killing
大元帥明王: (だいげんすいみょうおう) - Atavaka (guardian deity)
大兄: (たいけい) - older brother; (epistolary style)  you (in ref. to male of greater age or status)
大先輩: (だいせんぱい) - someone who is greatly one's senior; veteran
大入り: (おおいり) - (ant: 不入り) large attendance; full house; packed to capacity; large seating capacity
大入り満員: (おおいりまんいん) - full to capacity; full to bursting; house full; sellout
大入り袋: (おおいりぶくろ) - bonus paid to employees on occasion of a full house
大入満員: (おおいりまんいん) - full to capacity; full to bursting; house full; sellout
大入道: (おおにゅうどう) - large, bald-headed monster; a giant
大八車: (だいはちぐるま) - large two-wheeled wagon
大兵: (たいへい) - of great build or stature; great number of soldiers/great army
大兵肥満: (たいひょうひまん) - (yoji) big portly man
大典: (たいてん) - state ceremony; important law
大内裏: (たいだいり) - greater palace; area centered on the inner palace, home to various administrative bodies (in Heian period Kyoto)
大円: (だいえん) - large circle; great circle
大円鏡智: (だいえんきょうち) - adarsa-jnana (great-perfect-mirror wisdom, wisdom clearly elucidating all things)
大冊: (たいさつ) - large or bulky book or volume
大冬眠鼠: (オオヤマネ) - edible dormouse (Glis glis); fat dormouse
大凡: (おおよそ) - about/roughly/approximately; generally/on the whole/as a rule; completely/quite/entirely/altogether/totally/not at all (with neg. verb); outline/gist
大出来: (おおでき) - well-made; well-done; great success
大分: (だいぶん) - considerably; greatly; a lot
大切: (taisetsu) - importante, necessário, indispensável; amado, precioso, querido, estimado, valioso; cuidadoso
大切な人: (たいせつなひと) - special someone; special person; precious one; significant other
大切に: (たいせつに) - carefully; with caution; with great care
大切にする: (たいせつにする) - to cherish/to treasure/to prize/to set a high value on; to take good care of/to look after
大切り: (おおぎり) - (大切り, 大切 only) large cut (e.g. of meat); last piece of the day's programme/last act of a play/comic dialogue as the last item in vaudeville, music hall, etc.
大判: (おおばん) - large size; large oval Japanese gold coin
大前: (おおまえ) - presence (of a god, emperor, etc.)
大前提: (だいぜんてい) - major premise; principle
大剣: (たいけん) - large sword; long sword
大功: (たいこう) - distinguished or meritorious service
大動脈: (だいどうみゃく) - aorta; important traffic route
大動脈炎症候群: (だいどうみゃくえんしょうこうぐん) - aortitis syndrome
大動脈解離: (だいどうみゃくかいり) - aortic dissection
大勝: (たいしょう) - great victory; crushing victory
大勝ち: (おおかち) - great victory; big win; huge profit; killing
大勝利: (だいしょうり) - huge win; overwhelming victory
大勝負: (おおしょうぶ) - do-or-die game; crucial contest
大勢: (たいぜい) - many; crowd; great number of people
大勢順応: (たいせいじゅんのう) - (yoji) conformism; following the crowd; swimming with the tide; me-tooism
大勲位: (だいくんい) - supreme order (i.e. of the chrysanthemum); highest possible order of merit
大勲位菊花大綬章: (だいくんいきくかだいじゅしょう) - Grand Cordon of the Supreme Order of the Chrysanthemum
大勲位菊花章: (だいくんいきっかしょう) - Supreme Orders of the Chrysanthemum
大勲位菊花章頚飾: (だいくんいきっかしょうくびかざり) - Collar of the Supreme Order of the Chrysanthemum
大勲位菊花章頸飾: (だいくんいきっかしょうくびかざり) - Collar of the Supreme Order of the Chrysanthemum
